_description: Sanguis Christi: Drink it in faith — two couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Is a pirue pouyson& a ferli foysounQuedes for to
                    quellen& frendis for to fillen
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 35.
